text.p: These are some of the leading stories in the Iraqi official press on Friday. Reuters has not verified these stories and does not vouch for their accuracy.
- China condemns so-called no-fly zones in north and south Iraq.
- Algeria donates 16,500 tonnes of wheat to Iraq.
- Revolutionary Command Council issues amnesty to Kurdish servicemen.
- Trade ministry to distribute to civil servants some essential foodstuffs with prices 50 percent less than those on commercial market.
- A foreign ministry spokesman condemns the Turkish military operation in northern Iraq.
- Iraq urges Iran to solve the prisoners of war issue.
- Border between Iraq and Turkey at Habur has seen wide trade activities.
